messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Authorities on the list (was re: digestnumber 3840)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Depends on your point of view.    I was using the term a lot more loosely than the person I was replying to.  What I meant was that there are people on
messages.messageBody:
>
> You mean there really are authorities? Who are they?

Depends on your point of view. <g> I was using the term a lot more loosely
than the person I was replying to. What I meant was that there are people
on this list whose advice is almost always really good in my opinion. Some
of those people are also the people who were referred to as "authorities",
and it was used in a very negative sense, like they want to be in control.
Obviously I don't see it that way.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety
deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
